kesako.utilities

Class FileUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.utilities.FileUtilities

  • public class FileUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    File utilities.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

      • getExtension

        public static java.lang.String getExtension(java.lang.String filename)
        Return the extension of a file. The method works also with the absolute path of a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of a file

      • isValidExtansion

        public static boolean isValidExtansion(java.io.File f)
        Return TRUE if the file can be indexed.
        Parameters:
        f - file to index

      • getFileMetaName

        public static java.lang.String getFileMetaName(java.lang.String nomFic)
        The meta-data of a file is stored in a file with the extension .meta. The meta-data file is a XML file.
        The method return the name of the file of meta-data of an indexed file.
        Parameters:
        nomFic - name of an indexed file.
